title: The Hillandale Citizens Association, Inc.
text: Hillandale is located in Maryland on both sides of New Hampshire Avenue (Rt 650) north of the Capital Beltway in Montgomery and Prince George's counties. This website is dedicated to providing you with information about the community and is maintained by the Hillandale Citizens Association, Inc. (HCA) which was established in 1937. Adopt-A-Road HCA has adopted the portion of Powder Mill Road that flows through Hillandale. Please join us for the next scheduled cleanup event on Saturday, February 28th from 9-11AM. Volunteers should gather in the Value Village parking lot adjacent to Powder Mill. We advise that you wear a high-visibility vest or shirt since we will be working along a busy road. Also bring gloves and a grabber if you have one. Weâ€™ll supply the trash bags and the laughs! SSL hours can be earned for the students who participate. Hillandale Bulletin Read the November bulletin here. HCA Holiday Party The Hillandale Executive Board is excited about our future and we want you to be part of it! All of our board members are unpaid but dedicated volunteers. Please consider joining the HCA. Dues are $30 per year. Mission: The main goal of the HCA is to help make Hillandale a better, safer and more enriching environment for you and your family. Public Forum: Consider the HCA as your source for learning about developments in the community and for speaking out on neighborhood issues that concern you. Advocacy: The HCA advocates for the interests of the Hillandale community before the County Council and other venues. Social Events: National Night Out in August and the Holiday party in December Join our Groups.io listserve to participate in community messaging!
